name: SubLight
summary: Earth is gone, and the wake of its destruction is expanding outwards, towards your interstellar ark. A thousand refugees have put their faith in Aurora, a sophisticated artificial intelligence that you, the player, must control. Equipped only with sub-light speed propulsion, you plot century long voyages through the grim black reaches of interstellar space. Generations of people live and die aboard the small confines of your vessel. Humanity’s only chance for survival is to flee from one star system to another, gathering vital resources along the way. The critical choices you make will have consequences for generations to come.
